name: Capital Profit Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
Capital Profit Pre-Alpha Demo Give feedback here (click here)

This demo is based on gathering resources and crafting them into objects. It is similar to Minecraft, Stardew Valley and The Forest. Projected full release is summer 2021.

System requirements:
  • 8 GB Ram
  • i5 CPU
  • Dedicated graphics card
  • 1GB Storage space
How to play:
  • WASD for movement
  • Space bar to jump
  • Left mouse to pickup item/ Right mouse to drop item
  • Scroll wheel to change texture
  • i for inventory when backpack is on your back
  • E to interact (when pop up on screen)
  • F when have something in hand to go to placement mode
    • Once in placement mode:
      • Left click to place item
      • Right click to cancel
      • Scroll wheel to rotate
  • R to go to destruction mode
    • Once in destruction mode:
      • Left click to destroy item
      • Right click to cancel
Features included:
  • Tutorial
  • Mining/ digging/ changing terrain
  • Inventory
  • Smelting ores
  • Leveling up with XP
  • Item creation
  • Item blue placement
  • Wheel of fortune
Demo goals:
  • Try creating a silver necklace or a gold genie lamp with everything in the current demo
  • Create a mini-house/ shed
Please remember that this is just a demo/ prototype, it is an unfinished game. To quit the game after you are done playing do ALT-F4. Thank you!
